mapper.select: select from make_department LEFT JOIN make_department_attach_info on make_department.flag = make_department_attach_info.make_department_flag where make_department.id = #{id}

select from make_department LEFT JOIN make_department_attach_info on make_department.flag = make_department_attach_info.make_department_flag where make_department.delete_status = 0 and make_department.department_name like "%"#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and make_department.department_address like #{departmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"

select ,AVG(make_department_evaluate.score) as score from make_department JOIN make_department_attach_info on make_department.flag = make_department_attach_info.make_department_flag LEFT join make_department_evaluate on make_department.flag = make_department_evaluate.make_department_id where make_department.delete_status = 0 and make_department.department_name like "%"#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and make_department.department_address like #{departmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" GROUP BY make_department_evaluate.make_department_id ORDER BY score desc

select from make_department left JOIN make_department_attach_info on make_department.flag = make_department_attach_info.make_department_flag where make_department.delete_status = 0 and make_department.department_name like "%"#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" and make_department.department_address like #{departmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%" GROUP BY department_code
mapper.sql: id,department_code, department_name, department_nation_name, department_english_name, department_english_ahhr, department_type, legal_name, legal_id, legal_id_type, legal_englishsurname, legal_englishname, legal_telphone, department_address, department_address_detail, telphone, postal_code, department_status,version,flag,version_time,register_time,business_license_url,special_license_url,idcard_front_id,idcard_reverse_id

make_department.id as id,department_code, department_name, department_nation_name, department_english_name, department_english_ahhr, department_type, legal_name, legal_id, legal_id_type, legal_englishsurname, legal_englishname, legal_telphone, department_address, department_address_detail, telphone, postal_code, department_status,version,flag,version_time,register_time,business_license_url,special_license_url,idcard_front_id,idcard_reverse_id , make_department_attach_info.id as mid, bank_account, bank_name, bank_address, latitude, longitude, address_detail, promise_time, remarks, update_time, is_delete, make_department_flag
mapper.select: select from make_department where department_name like '%${departmentName}%' and department_address like '${districtId}%' limit 0,10
select from make_department where department_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_status = 0

select
from make_department where delete_status = 0 and legal_telphone =#{legalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select department_code from make_department where legal_telphone = #{legalPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into make_department (id,department_code, department_name, department_nation_name, department_english_name, department_english_ahhr,department_type, legal_name, legal_id, legal_id_type, legal_englishsurname, legal_englishname, legal_telphone, department_address, department_address_detail, telphone, postal_code,department_status, version,flag,version_time,register_time,delete_status, business_license_url,special_license_url,idcard_front_id,idcard_reverse_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentNationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentEnglishAhhr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEnglishsurname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEnglishname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'03', #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{versionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},1, #{businessLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{specialLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{idCardFrontId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{idCardReverseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update make_department set delete_status = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into make_department (id,department_code, department_name, department_nation_name, department_english_name, department_english_ahhr,department_type, legal_name, legal_id, legal_id_type, legal_englishsurname, legal_englishname, legal_telphone, department_address, department_address_detail, telphone, postal_code, version,flag,version_time,register_time, department_status, business_license_url,special_license_url,idcard_front_id,idcard_reverse_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentNationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentEnglishAhhr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalIdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEnglishsurname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEnglishname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{versionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'01', #{businessLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{specialLicenseUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{idCardFrontId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{idCardReverseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select
from make_department where delete_status = 0 and department_address =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from make_department where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select b.*, AVG(a.score) as score from make_department_evaluate a JOIN make_department b on b.flag = a.make_department_id and b.delete_status =0 and b.department_address LIKE '${districtId}%' GROUP BY a.make_department_id ORDER BY score

SELECT b.* ,count(1) as score from seal a JOIN make_department b on a.make_department_code = b.department_code and b.delete_status =0 and b.department_address LIKE '${districtId}%' GROUP BY a.make_department_code ORDER BY score
select from make_department where department_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_status = 0
select from make_department where department_code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_status = 0
select from make_department where department_code = #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_status = 0
select from make_department where flag = #{flag,jdbcType =VARCHAR} AND delete_status = 1 ORDER BY version_time DESC
